answers.answer: Hello.Do you have any other symptoms anywhere else? Your symptoms are suggestive of neuropathy. The origin of the neuropathy has to be ascertained. As you have mentioned the symptoms start when you are sleeping, we have to rule out any faulty sleeping position which may be leading to a compressed nerve in the arm or the forearm.Alternatively, you may have a bulging disc in the cervical spine.Have you had your blood sugar checked for Diabetes?Regards

question: I recurrently get a red rash on my right hand going up to the elbow with numbness in my thumb and first finger, it seems to happen after my arm goes to "sleep" in the night, it lasts for about 2-3 days, is there anything to this?
title: Numbness
